How I work

Talk to you.

I ask silly questions and try to understand what exactly the problem is. I'm trained in product management, so I'll even ask you why you've decided to do all of this.

Talk to users.

Whenever it's possible, we will go to your users to make sure we do what they actually need (or don't know yet they need it) and to test the solutions.

Work with developers.

My experience is mostly within cross-functional teams, from wich I learned to validate the solutions with the dev team as early as possible: good design should be implementable.

Currenlty I want to focus on designing products that leverage the best from new technologies. I am capable of combining product design with product management responsibilities.

As a graduate architect, I am a useful asset in products dedicated to emerging technologies in civil engineering, architecture and design.

But I'd love to hear from you if your product is just solving a real problem.

I don't work with crypto and iGaming.

I know:

UX/UI and product design Branding and logos B2B SaaS and B2C HTML and CSS AI-first Accessibility Digital illustration User and market research UX copy Product management Data visualisation

I design with Figma or HTML/CSS, make pictures in Illustrator or ProCreate. I worked mostly in cross-functional teams, as well as a part of design teams of 10+ people.
